text: Nasaara deqsita marak horta Qhuraanak Yallih farmoytal obsimtem yaabben waqdi ken intiitak Ximó caxitah table, usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) cakkiy Yallih xaquk obsimem kaak yeexegeenimih sabbatah, usun Yallat xaaqimak Ni-Rabbow koo Nummasneeh ku-farmoyta Nummasnehik Qhiyaamâ Saaku Nabii Mucammad jsa ummatak ummattal Sumaaqita marâ luk nee uktub iyyan
